item.title: Difference between 'Introduction' and 'Related Work'
item.description: Description In the writing of scientific papers, there are basically two chapters: Introduction and Related Work. This is a common issue, that many people get confused how to organize introduction and related work chapters. Because both are related to the literature review. References [1] Bob, “Difference between introduction and related work?,” Academia Stack Exchange, Oct. 31, 2016. https://academia.stackexchange.com/q/79164 (accessed May 12, 2023).
